name: WooCommerce Genie Checking
author: Anas

sections.description: WooCommerce Genie Checking Payment Gateway Extends WooCommerce Payment Gateway allow customer to pay using Genie CashBox.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/woo-genie-checking directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Enable this gateway from WooCommerce settings /wp-admin/admin.php?page=wc-settings&tab=checkout&section=geniechecking
sections.faq:
How do I setup API?

You need to signup here https://geniecashbox.com/ or https://geniechecking.com/signup.php
sections.changelog:
2.1.0

  • Compatibility check and working good.

1.2.1

  • Compatibility check

1.2

  • Add on hold option when confirm payment in settings area.

1.1

  • Fix callback return data
  • New features: Update it to order status is processing/complete when payment confirmed. Settings page has this option to set it.

1.0

  • Initial development.
